name: Ultimate Adventure 4
overview: You are standing in a market with some money and your quest is to buy items before leaving the market into the big bad world to make more money and return back to the market. You will encounter various locations like jungle, swamp and desert as well as alligators, bandits pythons etc and these will try to decrease your strength until you die. The screen has text to describe each location, how much money you have and your strength, and you type in commands with the keyboard to interact with your surroundings.
